plot: Series of one-off plays made by BBC television which gave breaks to a wide range of writers and directors in the late 60s, such as Dennis Potter, Ken Loach, David Mercer and John Hopkins. ...

cast.name: George Sewell
cast.role: Barny the tallyman, in the washhouse         / ...

title: The Wednesday Play
